title: NuRoSlab web test
content:
I’m in the process of redoing a fairly experimental typeface I did around a decade ago called [Roice](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317141002/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/fontfont/ff_roice_ot/).

The new version will probably be called NuRoSlab (NuRo being short for New Roice) and it aims to be a version of Roice for the real world, meaning, among other things, that it’s a lot less experimental.

Right now I’m testing it as a webfont on my [website](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317141002/http:/typophile.com/wiki/www.alexscholing.nl). Let me know what you think.  
Cheers, Alex

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317141002im_/http:/typophile.com/files/alxstest_5716.jpg)
author: alex scholing
